chapter_title: On the River Gran, Among the Quadi
summary: Marcus reflects on the transience of life and the importance of living according to nature and reason. He emphasizes the need to focus on the present moment and accept what cannot be changed.

micro_lessons.title: Transience of Life
micro_lessons.core_idea: Life is brief. Use time wisely. Focus on what matters.
micro_lessons.micro_test_q: What is Marcus's view on the length of human life?
micro_lessons.micro_test_a: Life is extremely brief in the context of eternity, so one must use time wisely and focus on virtue.

micro_lessons.title: Present Moment
micro_lessons.core_idea: The present is all we truly have. Past is gone, future uncertain.
micro_lessons.micro_test_q: Why should one focus on the present moment?
micro_lessons.micro_test_a: The past is gone and cannot be changed, the future is uncertain, so only the present offers real agency.
